peeragogical-action-review.what-happened: We made some progress on editing the handbook There was a small, but mighty group of people going through the course and it went well!
peeragogical-action-review.what-happened-perspectives: The regular meeting times we found in January have been invaluable in terms of keeping us moving and giving our work a heartbeat Like a television show pilot the course still has some kinks to work out, but it is looking very promising for the future
peeragogical-action-review.learnings-changes: Running an online course on peeragogy is fun Floobits is a nice online tool for editing the handbook that connects directly to GitHub, although it is not the most user friendly for everyone
peeragogical-action-review.what-else-should-change-going-forward: Keep improving how we learn and produce things collaboratively!
